title: Can an admin please see this..
body: My dad bought me 4 $10 RP cards, and when I tried entering them in it said they weren't valid. I was there when he bought them and this is the only thing he could afford to get me. I want to know if there's a way to fix this.

replies.body:
We have a really handy support article for incomm cards here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753224-Prepaid-RP-Cards-NA-OCE-

I did notice that you were including the spaces.  We have having some issues with redeeming incomm cards right now, but the next time you submit your code make sure you don't have any spaces.

If that doesn't work, make sure you submit a Player Support ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
